I'm Adi, a tech enthusiast. Java was the first programming language that I learned and the science of designing algorithms, converting them to code, and performing computation fascinated me so much that I decided to explore it further and pursue a career in it.


![Readme Quotes](https://quotes-github-readme.vercel.app/api?type=horizontal&theme=catppuccin_mocha)
